data.name: In Sink Demo
data.detailed_description:
Join up with an online friend and escape the island together! Will the two of you be able to co-operate well enough to escape, or will you succumb to this strange and mysterious island?

NOTE: This game is co-op only. It requires 2 players to have a working PC and an internet connection. It also requires voice communication, so it's recommended to either use Steam's built-in voice chat, or alternatively you and your partner could join a two-person call in our Discord server: http://discord.com/invite/eGVr5wU.




Follow the journey of two friends shipwrecked on a mysterious island. Travel through rifts to other worlds where you'll have to solve series of differently themed escape rooms, block puzzles, and other mysteries. Each thematic rift you conquer brings you one step closer to getting back home - so success is reliant on you and your partner being In Sink.

data.short_description: Work together to solve the various puzzles and escape rooms and break free in this stylized multiplayer co-op adventure. Victory requires more than just you and your partner thinking alike - you'll have to be In Sink.
data.legal_notice: If you feel that your intellectual property has been violated or used unlawfully in some way, please contact us via the support contact info.
